entry.title: Globe Mini Model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mini Model
Type: Model Kits
Price: 5.25

The world is your oyster with this micro-globe model!

Each pack contains one brass flat pack model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

This tiny object of desire is one of eleven designs in the range of mini-onaires.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 30 x 35 x 42mm
Packaging Dimensions: 10.5 x 10.5cm
Product Weight: 10g

entry.title: Brass Bird Decoration
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 8.95

A beautifully etched brass bird mobile.

Packed flat, it simply folds together to create an elegant hanging bird decoration. Display with your plants or from a shelf.

Each pack contains one brass model with assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape, no adhesives or tools required!

Contents: x1 brass model, and assembly instructions.
Product Dimensions:80mm diameter
Packaging:148 x 105mm printed on FSC 100% recycled paper, sealed in a plastic free compostable cello wrap. 
Weight: 10g

entry.title: Tiny Trophies - Utterly Gorgeous
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Fun Gifts
Price: 2.25

Tiny Trophies are the perfect excuse for you to celebrate the people in your life - family, friends, a colleague - and share what they mean to you. Fun and playful, these miniature brass awards are a great gift to highlight a person’s qualities and let slip what you admire and love about them the most.

Each Tiny Trophy is easy to assemble, the base of the trophy simply folding to stand upright. Lightweight and packed flat, these cute, little awards are easy gifts to send in the post.

Contents: Tiny Trophy
Materials: Paper, Brass
Packaging Dimensions: 52mm x 148mm
Product Dimensions: 45 x 25 x 10mm

entry.title: London Icon Bookmarks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.97

Top your books and files with a tiny piece of London's heritage - a great little gift for every London lover.

This London Icons set includes four stainless steel bookmarks; a miniature Black Cab, Post Box, Telephone Box and the famous Double-decker Bus.

Contents: Four page markers
Materials: Stainless steel, paper
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 148mm

entry.title: Crown mini model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 5.25

A cute little dolls size crown for the special Prince, Princess, King or Queen in your life.

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
Product Dimensions: 38 x 38 x 40mm
Packaging Dimensions: 105 x 105mm

entry.title: Cocktail mini model
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Model Kits
Price: 5.25

Send a celebratory gift to make your own cocktail kit. Alcohol-free fun and a cute gift idea for party lovers.

Each pack contains one brass model with step by step assembly instructions. Simply fold the metal into shape. No adhesives are required but tweezers or small pliers may be helpful.

Contents: metal model, instructions
Materials: coated stainless steel, paper
